title: Microsoft Corp. stock outperforms competitors despite losses on the day
text:
Shares of Microsoft Corp. 
        MSFT,
        -0.17%
       shed 0.32% to $410.34 Friday, on what proved to be an all-around favorable trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        +0.11%
       rising 0.03% to 5,088.80 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       rising 0.16% to 39,131.53. Microsoft Corp. closed $10.48 short of its 52-week high ($420.82), which the company reached on February 9th. The stock demonstrated a mixed performance when compared to some of its competitors Friday, as Apple Inc. 
        AAPL,
        -1.06%
       fell 1.00% to $182.52, Alphabet Inc. Cl C 
        GOOG,
        +0.21%
       fell 0.02% to $145.29, and Alphabet Inc. Cl A 
        GOOGL,
        +0.04%
       fell 0.09% to $143.96. Trading volume (16.1 M) remained 8.9 million below its 50-day average volume of 25.0 M.
